title: Support broker priority election for controller mode
description:
FEATURE REQUEST

  1. Please describe the feature you are requesting.
    Support broker priority election for controller mode

  2. Provide any additional detail on your proposed use case for this feature.

  • Add a new config in brokerConfig: brokerElectionPriority, which is an important basis for the controller to choose the broker master. Under the same conditions, the broker with higher priority will be selected as master. You can set a higher priority for the broker with better machine conditions.

  • In DefaultElectPolicy, previously we would sort brokers by (epoch, offset), now we will sort by (epoch, offset, electionPriority)

description_text:
FEATURE REQUEST


Please describe the feature you are requesting.
Support broker priority election for controller mode


Provide any additional detail on your proposed use case for this feature.




Add a new config in brokerConfig: brokerElectionPriority, which is an important basis for the controller to choose the broker master. Under the same conditions, the broker with higher priority will be selected as master. You can set a higher priority for the broker with better machine conditions.


In DefaultElectPolicy, previously we would sort brokers by (epoch, offset), now we will sort by (epoch, offset, electionPriority)




Indicate the importance of this issue to you (blocker, must-have, should-have, nice-to-have). Are you currently using any workarounds to address this issue?


If there are some sub-tasks involved, use -[] for each sub-task and create a corresponding issue to map to the sub-task:
